com.hazelcast.internal.partition.impl

Class PartitionReplicaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.internal.partition.impl.PartitionReplicaManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PartitionReplicaVersionManager

    public class PartitionReplicaManager
extends Object
implements PartitionReplicaVersionManager
    Maintains the version values for the partition replicas and manages the replica-related operations for partitions

    • Method Detail

      • triggerPartitionReplicaSync

        public void triggerPartitionReplicaSync(int partitionId,
                                        Collection<ServiceNamespace> namespaces,
                                        int replicaIndex)
        This method is called on a backup node (replica). Given all conditions are satisfied, this method initiates a replica sync operation and registers it to replicaSyncRequest. The operation is scheduled for a future execution if :
        • the delayMillis is greater than 0
        • if a migration is not allowed (during repartitioning or a node joining the cluster)
        • the partition is currently migrating
        • another sync request has already been sent
        • the maximum number of parallel synchronizations has already been reached
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partition which is being synchronized
        namespaces - namespaces of partition replica fragments
        replicaIndex - the index of the replica which is being synchronized
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the replica index is not between 0 and InternalPartition.MAX_REPLICA_COUNT

      • getServiceNamespace

        public ServiceNamespace getServiceNamespace(Operation operation)
        Description copied from interface: PartitionReplicaVersionManager
        Returns ServiceNamespace for given operation. If operation is instance of ServiceNamespaceAware then ServiceNamespaceAware.getServiceNamespace() will be used. Otherwise NonFragmentedServiceNamespace will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getServiceNamespace in interface PartitionReplicaVersionManager
        Parameters:
        operation - operation
        Returns:
        service namespace for operation

        public long[] incrementPartitionReplicaVersions(int partitionId,
                                                ServiceNamespace namespace,
                                                int backupCount)
        Description copied from interface: PartitionReplicaVersionManager
        Increments replica versions for given partition and namespace by the number of backup count.

        Parameters:

      • updatePartitionReplicaVersions

        public void updatePartitionReplicaVersions(int partitionId,
                                           ServiceNamespace namespace,
                                           long[] versions,
                                           int replicaIndex)
        Description copied from interface: PartitionReplicaVersionManager
        Updates the partition replica version and triggers replica sync if the replica is dirty (e.g. the received version is not expected and this node might have missed an update)
        Specified by:
        updatePartitionReplicaVersions in interface PartitionReplicaVersionManager
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the ID of the partition for which we received a new version
        namespace - replica namespace
        versions - the received replica versions
        replicaIndex - the index of this replica

      • isPartitionReplicaVersionStale

        public boolean isPartitionReplicaVersionStale(int partitionId,
                                              ServiceNamespace namespace,
                                              long[] versions,
                                              int replicaIndex)
        Description copied from interface: PartitionReplicaVersionManager
        Returns whether given replica version is behind the current version or not.
        Specified by:
        isPartitionReplicaVersionStale in interface PartitionReplicaVersionManager
        Parameters:
        partitionId - partition ID
        namespace - replica namespace
        versions - replica versions
        replicaIndex - specific replica index
        Returns:
        true if given version is stale, false otherwise

      • finalizeReplicaSync

        public void finalizeReplicaSync(int partitionId,
                                int replicaIndex,
                                ServiceNamespace namespace,
                                long[] versions)
        Set the new replica versions for the partition with the partitionId and reset any ongoing replica synchronization request for this partition and replica index.
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partition ID
        replicaIndex - the index of the replica
        versions - the new replica versions for the partition

      • clearReplicaSyncRequest

        public void clearReplicaSyncRequest(int partitionId,
                                    ServiceNamespace namespace,
                                    int replicaIndex)
        Resets the state of the replica synchronization request for the given partition and replica. This will cancel the scheduled synchronization, clear the ongoing sync flag and release a synchronization permit.
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partition being synchronized
        namespace - namespace
        replicaIndex - the index of the replica being synchronized
